This app is packed with powerful content and resources to help you grow and stay connected: The Savage Nation Podcast, The Sean Hannity Show, The Dan Bongino Show, etc... Michael Alan Weiner, better known by his professional name Michael Savage, is an American radio host, author, activist, nutritionist, and conservative political commentator. Join Dr. Michael Savage, host of The Savage NationÂ® Radio show, National Radio Hall of Fame Inductee, and New York Times Bestselling Author for a bold perspective on American ideals, the truth about liberalism and national security, and what is really happening with today's politics.

With this app you can:
âœ“ Fast Search - Search for Podcasts if you don't find your favorites in Editor's Choice.
âœ“ Forward/Back - Play back and forward by 2 minutes while listening to Podcasts allows easy navigation.
âœ“ Favourites - Subscribe to your favourite Podcasts to manage them from one place.
âœ“ Notified for New Episodes - Get notified about new episodes being added to your subscribed Podcasts.
âœ“ Filter episodes - Build up your own customized playlist for different scenes and moods
âœ“ Offline Listening - Download and save episodes for offline listening, without Internet. This helps users in big saving network data plan. It is like recording & listen later.
âœ“ Save data - You can change in setting to only download podcast on WiFi only.
âœ“ Auto Play - Set option to auto play episodes one after the other, avoiding hassle to change episodes and helps in seamless listening experience. Its interesting features for long drives and long listening hours.
âœ“ Share it - Share podcast with your friends: One-step sharing episode URL with/without play location to enjoy entertainment with your friends.
âœ“ Automatic file management - Automatic podcast download and deletion.
âœ“ Import/Export OPML file
âœ“ Add podcast from url
